Title: Day 8: 3:00 P.M. - 4:00 P.M.
Plot: Emotions run high as the harrowing day climaxes with resolute President Taylor closing in on a world-changing peace treaty and a vengeful Jack Bauer taking matters into his own hands for one last and unforgettable job.
GuestStars: Kiefer Sutherland, Annie Wersching, Mary Lynn Rajskub
